New Records: Glenn Phillips hit a century after being dropped twice
Trent Boult took 4 wickets for 13 runs
Key Match Events: New Zealand recovered from 15-3 to post 167-7
Lahiru Kumara hit four boundaries in the final over
Pre-Game Insights: Kane Williamson emphasized the importance of focusing on the next game and match-winners
Dasun Shanaka mentioned areas for improvement in fielding and chasing totals
Post-Match Reflections: Kane Williamson praised Glenn Phillips' knock
Glenn Phillips discussed his performance and the team's effort
Stuart Clark highlighted New Zealand's dominance and Sri Lanka's struggles

New Zealand's bowlers performed well in the early overs
